div.p: Yeah I have a family of my own, a wife and one child, it’s a happy lifestyle man, a very happy family.
In my spare time I’m an avid basketball player, I love playing basketball, I love watching basketball, and music,
I’m literally a music geek, alright, I like well yeah that’s all I do with my spare time is I just play music or watch sports
and it’s just basketball I watch I watch nothing else so that is all I do, you won’t find me doing anything else in my spare time
I don’t play chess, I don’t go to the pub... I don’t do anything, I don’t even cook, I literally just play music, that’s it, play or listen to music.
